website_summaries.verdict: Built to perform in the shade, and delivers movie-quality imagery via a high-impact screen.
pros: Exceptionally bright, instilling confidence in the purchasing decisions of first-time outdoor television buyers
Works well poolside when shade is available
AV panel is tightly sealed to prevent damage
cons: Speakers aren't loud and can be muffled by sprinklers or loud pool equipment

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: So I got my 55-Inch Veranda TV just last week and was able to install it on Saturday easily. Hooking up both cable and Roku were simple. We just finished a complete overhaul of our backyard – new covered patio and pavers, and the TV was the final touch. We had friends over to watch the Stanley Cup finals and then the NBA finals the next day, and the picture was great. Everyone around the backyard could clearly see the action and hear the games. My daughters are already setting up movie nights with their friends. I would recommend this TV to anyone trying to create an entertainment area in their backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor TV!
customer_reviews.text: Love the durability, simplicity, and performance of this TV, easy to connect, works perfectly, looks great outdoors in the brighter light. I was even able to connect my Amazon Fire 4k TV and power it using the TV USB port, so it's completely enclosed in the rear cabinet. Sound isnt perfect (to be expected) so add a good sound bar and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hadlock

customer_reviews.title: The TV is so clear and beautiful. The only thing i don't like is the ...
customer_reviews.text: The TV is so clear and beautiful. The only thing i don't like is the sound. when sitting outside you have to put it up to about 80 if you have sprinklers or your pool equipment running. Would give it 5 stars if the sound quality were better. Other than that it's a gorgeous TV.
customer_reviews.author: Kris P

customer_reviews.title: Built tough!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV that is built for the outdoors. The fit and finish is great and the panel enclosing the AV connections is well sealed. Picture is great and I had no issues with the install. I would have given 5 stars if the ethernet connection provided more than firmware updates. It would be nice to stream apps right out of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Beamer

customer_reviews.title: great outdoor picture
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely and well boxed for protection. Did not know it was wall mount only but that was my intention anyways. Picture is very good in bright sunlight, sun does need to be somewhat behind and not shining directly on the screen to view and maintain heat level. A bit pricey but hopefully worth it as our last tv got hit by the smallest amount of water on the screen and stopped working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: Favorite TV in house!—er outside the house!
customer_reviews.text: Watch this baby almost every night on the back patio. Also have an older 32” sunbrite. This one is lighter than that one, and the picture is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M Williams

customer_reviews.title: Sunbrite has me ready for FOOTBALL!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. My wife and I used to drag out an inside TV during football season but that got to be a pain taking it in and out. The TV arrived several days early (very nice). The wall mount Amazon recommend for the TV was easy to assemble and attach to the TV. Set up was pretty simple. We have an antenna and a Roku running on it and the picture looks great. Like other reviewers I agree the sound could be better but I’m planning on running a jawbone speaker through it. I can’t wait for football; this is where I’ll be living all football season.
customer_reviews.author: C. C. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Great quality without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is great. This was well worth the investment and was a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: SVE Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: 2 DOA
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 TV for a menu board. 1 will not turn on at all. The other has a bad display screen with no physical damage. Technical support is saying we should have tested the TVs on arrival and report back within 2 days but the TVs were sent to the signage company installing our menu board. We had no way to check. No exchange or repair.
customer_reviews.author: welby

customer_reviews.title: Superior product to the Mirage Outdoor TV product as it arrived in good working order. Do not but Mirage Outdoor Product.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great in protecting the product during shipment. The TV set up was easy and mounting to the wall was a piece of cake. The only negative is the volume control on the remote was difficult to use. Overall very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: GordonAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great TV and Install
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear. Only way to go in Houston 100% heat and humidity for outdoor use. Very happy and they expedited shipment to replace in 4 days due to freight damage on first shipment so I could enjoy it over Father's Day. Also kudos to Dish installers as they installed it outside ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not a smart TV
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great and hopefully will work for many years in a protected outdoor environment. However, I was dismayed that the TV is not a Smart TV and cannot access my wifi system thus limiting its use. Perhaps the newer version has this feature and I should have upgraded to the newer version? Also, the large back panel caused issues with my existing mounting bracket and I had to get a metal saw to modify my bracket as the back panel stuck out so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leann O. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money
customer_reviews.text: This tv lasted 18 months and picture gone already - huge disappointment since it is 3 x the price of regular tv
customer_reviews.author: cjg

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I gave this some time to make sure. This is the clearest, most beautiful picture on a TV of all we own, and it is designed for outside. The back door to all the connections comes with sealed edges. I had no idea they made TVs this well. I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CoachDave

customer_reviews.title: hdmi ports
customer_reviews.text: When I received this television last June 2 of the HDMI ports were bad (Picture was pink). It wasnt a big deal because I only needed 1 port and there were 4. Last September 3rd port went bad. Last week 4th port went bad (now all 4 hdmi ports show a pink screen). I am forced to use the old fashioned coax cable.... Fortunately that still provides picture and sound but at a far diminished quality. This television was very expensive- these problems should not have happened.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: Bought for outdoor pavilion. Was pleasantly surprised at how great the vibrant color and how crisp the picture is. Used it when shady and also full sun and no glare ! Very pleased ! Also no need for speaker or soundbar for us .. no trouble hearing sound at a normal volume
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: A great outdoor TV for my back patio; however, I was disappointed that it wasn't a smart TV with wifi. One assumes nowadays that most TVs are smart TVs. I purchased a Fire Stick, which allowed me to stream. With my smart TVs, I'm able to stream from the apps already on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Overall A good quality TV
customer_reviews.text: The TV picture and sound is of good quality. However, it lacks the ability to set up with a sound bar and sub woofer for better sound or surround sound. It doesn't pair up with most cable companies for remote. It's not a smart TV, so you can't use other video options such as Prime TV or the internet.
customer_reviews.author: William Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Screen broken upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: Product was broken upon opening box. Screen is shattered. Impossible to return. Extremely upset and disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with the first one that was delivered but they made it right very quickly. Sunbright had a new tv sent a few days after I contacted them. We truly love the tv. The picture is crisp and clear, and sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Shooshene

customer_reviews.title: TV arrived in perfect condition and is performing as advertised
customer_reviews.text: TV arrived in perfect condition and is performing as advertised. We are very happy to be able to watch TV outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay tv
customer_reviews.text: Okay tv. Was expecting more for the price. Remote isn’t as nice as a regular cable tv remote. Box on the back of tv covering the input ports could be a bit bigger for fire stick
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Hoxmeier

customer_reviews.title: Not a smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Great quality build and remote control is also built for outdoors.Great picture, Just remember this is not a smart tv
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD SLEDGE

customer_reviews.title: .l
customer_reviews.text: Tv came in as promised. Setup was easy and ordered the stand that worked perfectly. Using in covered lanai and picture is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great TV.  Audio could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Tv is great. Love the media bay. TiVo mini fits inside perfectly. Only complaint is that the audio quality could be better. Volume needs to be >= 75/100 in order to hear well.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: We love our new SunBrite Outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: We love our new SunBrite Outdoor TV. No glare, the sound is perfect and we can enjoy it poolside!! ChEeRs!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: good picture indirect sunlight will over shadow picture sound is not overly strong but the TV was easily installed and is a great addition to the patio The TV is as advertised great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Todd F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv
customer_reviews.text: . Great picture outside. Seemed easy to hang Was a birthday gift for my husband and he seems very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gina S.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Very bright picture - looks great! This is my husband’s new favorite thing!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri VanKirk

customer_reviews.title: Great Bright Picture!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Picture. Wish the remote was RF. Have to be close to use remote.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: $20.000 dollars spent with you already, please contac me. 919-495-8817
customer_reviews.text: This product is used to show production numbers in our facilities. This is number 10, number 9 did not work, please send me shipping information to return number 9.
customer_reviews.author: Mike miller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: TV works great, I just wish the remote was less confusing and had a little more range.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Hoepfner

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE TV
customer_reviews.text: WHEN I START THE TV THE SUNBRITE LOGO STAYS ON TO LONG. OTHER WISE IT A GREAT TV .
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor TV
customer_reviews.text: Even though it's in the shade, because it's outdoors, there is still some glare during daylight hours and still a little difficult viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore A. Manno

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tv
customer_reviews.text: This tv has the best picture, it's a great television with great sound as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christine West

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Docked a star due to no smart TV ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Docked a star due to no smart TV functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Boller

product_meta.title: SunBriteTV Outdoor TV 55-Inch Veranda (1st Gen) 4K Ultra HDTV LED Black - SB-5574UHD-BL
feature_bullets: Replaced by 2nd Gen Veranda model SB-V-55-4KHDR-BL
